title: Angel & Faith: Season 10, Vol. 1: Where the River Meets the Sea
description: Angel’s work is never done. Last time he averted an apocalypse, part of London turned into a chaotic stew of supernatural forces. Who better to watch over it than Angel himself? Or so he thinks. Meanwhile, Faith begins a new chapter in her life — slaying the undead, and then going corporate...Collects Angel & Faith Season 10 #1–#5.
author: Victor Gischler
